pages.privacy-policy: ChronoBazaar - Privacy Policy ChronoBazaar HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Privacy Policy ChronoBazaar takes the privacy of its users seriously. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information when you use our website. Information We Collect **Information you provide directly:** This includes information you enter when you create an account, such as your username, email address, and password. It may also include information you provide when you buy or sell items on ChronoBazaar, such as your name, shipping address, and payment information. **Information collected automatically:** When you use ChronoBazaar, we may collect certain information automatically, such as your IP address, browser type, and the referring website. We may also collect information about your activity on ChronoBazaar, such as the items you view and the searches you perform. How We Use Your Information To provide and improve ChronoBazaar services, such as facilitating transactions and communicating with other users. To personalize your experience on ChronoBazaar, such as recommending items you may be interested in. To send you marketing communications, such as newsletters and promotional offers. (You can opt out of receiving these communications at any time.) To comply with legal and regulatory requirements. How We Share Your Information We may share your information with third-party service providers who help us operate ChronoBazaar, such as payment processors and shipping companies. We may share your information with law enforcement or other government agencies if required by law. We will not share your information with any other third party without your consent. Data Retention We will retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you with services. We may also retain your information for legal or regulatory reasons. Your Choices You can access and update your personal information at any time by logging into your account. You can choose to opt out of receiving marketing communications from us. You can delete your account at any time. The ChronoBazaar website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline ChronoBazaar Discover exquisite watches. pages.terms-conditions: ChronoBazaar - Terms and Conditions ChronoBazaar HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Terms and Conditions Welcome to ChronoBazaar! These terms and conditions ("Terms") govern your use of our website and services ("Services"). By using our Services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. Eligibility You must be at least 18 years old to use our Services. You may also be required to agree to additional terms and conditions specific to certain features of our Services. User Accounts You may be required to create an account to use certain features of our Services. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and password. You are also responsible for all activity that occurs under your account. Use of Services You agree to use our Services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to use our Services in any way that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair our servers or networks. You agree not to attempt to gain unauthorized access to our Services, computer systems, or networks. You agree not to upload any content that is illegal, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, obscene, hateful, or racially or ethnically offensive. You agree not to violate any intellectual property rights of any third party. Transactions ChronoBazaar is a platform that connects buyers and sellers. We are not responsible for the completion of any transactions between users. You are responsible for conducting your own due diligence before buying or selling any items on ChronoBazaar. Disclaimers WE PROVIDE OUR SERVICES "AS IS" AND WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY OR GUARANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED. TO THE EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, WE DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT. Limitation of Liability IN NO EVENT SHALL WE BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR EXEMPLARY DAMAGES, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO, DAMAGES FOR LOSS OF PROFITS, GOODWILL, DATA, OR USE, ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO THE USE OR INABILITY TO USE OUR SERVICES, EVEN IF WE HAVE BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES. Termination We may terminate your access to our Services for any reason, at any time, without notice. We may also suspend or disable your access to certain features of our Services. Governing Law These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws , without regard to its conflict of laws provisions. Entire Agreement These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and us regarding your use of our Services. Supersedes all prior or contemporaneous communications and proposals, whether oral or written. Amendments We may amend these Terms at any time by posting the amended terms on our website. You are responsible for checking these Terms periodically for updates. Your continued use of our Services after the amended terms are posted constitutes your acceptance of the amended terms. The ChronoBazaar website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline ChronoBazaar Discover exquisite watches.
